Title: She and He
Actors: Sachiko Hidari, Kikuji Yamashita, Eiji Okada, Akio Hasegawa
Plot: As her husband Eiichi becomes more entangled in his life as businessman, Naoko looks for ways to expand her own life even as her husband's life shrinks in scope and intimacy. She finds new interests, new love, and a greater sense of her place in the world.
